```{r 01010001setup, include=FALSE}
## 01010001 Arithmetic mean of a list of integers.
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
## DATA GENERATION
signifDig <- 4

n = sample(15:20, 1)

data = c(sample(1:10, n, replace=TRUE))


## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION
(sol = mean(data))

(sol = signif(sol, signifDig))
```


```{r eval=(language == "en"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
question=paste0("Given the set of values $$", paste0(data, collapse = ", "),"$$ find their **arithmetic mean**.")

answer=paste0("The answer is ",
  sol
)

```
